00041 Menu::Menu(const char* const STR_Name, const Help& CLI_Help)

00096 void Menu::SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli)
00097 {
00098     SyntaxNode::SetCli(CLI_Cli);
00099     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00100             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Get help")
00101             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Obtenir de l'aide"));
00102         m_pcliHelp = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("help", cli_Help)));
00103         m_pcliHelp->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00104     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00105             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, Help::Concat("Exit menu '", GetKeyword(), "'"))
00106             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, Help::Concat("Sortir du menu '", GetKeyword(), "'")));
00107         m_pcliExit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("exit", cli_Help)));
00108         m_pcliExit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00109     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00110             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Quit")
00111             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Quitter"));
00112         m_pcliQuit = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("quit", cli_Help)));
00113         m_pcliQuit->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00114     {   Help cli_Help(Help()
00115             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_EN, "Print Working Menu")
00116             .AddHelp(Help::LANG_FR, "Affichage du menu courant"));
00117         m_pcliPwm = dynamic_cast<Keyword*>(& AddElement(new Keyword("pwm", cli_Help)));
00118         m_pcliPwm->AddElement(new Endl(cli_Help)); }
00119 }
00120 
00121 const bool Menu::ExecuteReserved(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00122 {
00123     CommandLineIterator it(CLI_CommandLine);
00124 
00125     if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00126     else if (it == GetHelpNode())
00127     {
00128         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00129         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00130         {
00131             GetShell().DisplayHelp();
00132             return true;
00133         }
00134     }
00135     else if (it == GetExitNode())
00136     {
00137         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00138         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00139         {
00140             GetShell().ExitMenu();
00141             return true;
00142         }
00143     }
00144     else if (it == GetQuitNode())
00145     {
00146         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00147         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00148         {
00149             GetShell().Quit();
00150             return true;
00151         }
00152     }
00153     else if (it == GetPwmNode())
00154     {
00155         if (! it.StepIt()) { return false; }
00156         if (dynamic_cast<const Endl*>(*it))
00157         {
00158             GetShell().PrintWorkingMenu();
00159             return true;
00160         }
00161     }
00162 
00163     return false;
00164 }
00165 
00166 const bool Menu::Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const
00167 {
00168     GetErrorStream() << "(no execution defined)" << endl;
00169     return true;
00170 }
